examples.example: 他在销售领域取得了非凡的成就，大家都很钦佩他。

translate.english: He has made extraordinary achievements in the field of sales, and everyone admires him very much.

examples.example: 那位优秀的销售人员用真诚和专业赢得了客户的信任和好评。

translate.english: That excellent salesperson won the trust and praise of the customers with sincerity and professionalism.

examples.example: 销售人员用热情和专业为顾客提供了优质的服务。

translate.english: Salespeople provided high-quality services to customers with enthusiasm and professionalism.
